lead_paragraph: Substitute Sergio Araujo struck a late equaliser as Las Palmas held Real Madrid to a 2-2 draw and left them with a one-point lead over Barcelona at the top of La Liga on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Close Gap as Real Draw at Las Palmas
headline.main: Barcelona Close Gap as Real Draw at Las Palmas

snippet: Substitute Sergio Araujo struck a late equaliser as Las Palmas held Real Madrid to a 2-2 draw and left them with a one-point lead over Barcelona at the top of La Liga on Saturday....
